text: and if he be of those of the right [hand],He said:By which is meant those who realise God�s oneness (muwaḥḥidūn). The outcome (ʿāqiba) will be theirs, for they were God�s faithful servants who delivered the trust (amāna), namely, that which He has commanded and prohibited. Those who followed in excellence (iḥsān) did not commit any transgressions nor did they make any slips, so they became secure from the fear (khawf) and terror (hawl) which comes to [others].His words, Exalted is He:
